item.title: SQL joins really explained
item.description: I’ve got asked how SQL joins really work. Let me explain real quick, imagine a database of student with a simple (1:N) relationship, a city students are from. I will use the tiny SQLite3 database system, you can do this too: $ sqlite3 joins.sqlite3 SQLite version 3.36.0 2021-06-18 18:36:39 Enter ".help" for usage hints. Create tables city and student: sqlite> create table city (id integer, name text); sqlite> create table student (id integer, name text, city_id integer); Insert few rows:
